name: Flow Simulation (Surface)
description: Construct flow paths along a surface

inputs.name: Surface
inputs.description: Base landscape form (as surface) for the flows

inputs.name: Points
inputs.description: Start points for the flow paths

inputs.name: Fidelity
inputs.description: Amount to move for each flow iteration. Small numbers may take a long time to compute

outputs.name: Flow Points
outputs.description: The points of each simulated point of movement
